title: What‚Äôs behind the return of mini-me dressing?
description: As more parents dress like their kids ‚Äì and more children dress like grownups ‚Äì some are asking if our offspring have become style inspirations ‚Ä¶ or even accessoriesThe Princess of Wales and her 10-year-old daughter, Princess Charlotte, seemed to have shared not just a carriage but also outfit notes at trooping the colour last weekend, since they were both wearing neighbouring blues on the colour wheel. They do it a lot, this so-called ‚Äúmini-me dressing‚Äù ‚Äì via tartans and tiaras, nautical details and nifty colour accents.She‚Äôs not the only one. Kim Kardashian does it with her kids, Beyonc√© does it with Blue Ivy. In fact, it tallies with the whole vibe of nepo babies, who are now appearing in the public eye wearing outfits that are sartorial embodiments of the relationships that will privilege them for life. Continue reading...
author: Ellie Violet Bramley

title: ‚ÄòFashion is about fantasy‚Äô: Max Mara‚Äôs short shorts are inspired by postwar Naples
description: Brand known for no-nonsense style and camel coats channels the glamour and poverty of the city in Italian cinemaMax Mara is known for its deep-pile camel coats and conservative northern Italian style. But in tune with the times, this season‚Äôs show at the baroque Palace of Caserta outside Naples opened with a pair of very short shorts.Tight and high-waisted, the vibe was Vogue but the inspiration was the 1949 Italian realist film Riso Amaro (Bitter Rice) and a 19-year-old Italian actor, Silvana Mangano, in a paddy field wearing damp shorts and stockings, which ended up on global billboards. Continue reading...
author: Morwenna Ferrier in Naples

title: 39 Summer Fashion Finds From Nordstrom‚Äôs Sale Section
description: Summer dressing hits different ‚Äî breezy dresses, crisp white tops, and nautical-inspired staples from poplin button-downs to boat shoes (√† la the trending fisherman aesthetic), are simply everything. Add in this season‚Äôs sandal lineup (Flip-flops! Slides! Kitten heels!) and a color palette spanning butter yellow to powder pink ‚Äî plus cheery prints like polka dots and stripes ‚Äî and it‚Äôs officially time to refresh the rotation.Luckily, Nordstrom‚Äôs sale section is here, with up to 75% off, just in time to revamp your summer wardrobe. As a fashion editor, I‚Äôm always combing through it for the best finds ‚Äî timeless staples, trend-forward styles, and everything in between. Right now, I‚Äôm stocking up on the kind of pieces that make summer dressing feel easy: cute dress-and-sneaker combos, playful bubble hems, airy raffia accessories, fun sunglasses, and standout swim. And yes, I‚Äôm still making room for loungewear ‚Äî just the kind that can handle a heat wave and feel perfectly effortless during summer travel. Plus summer wedding guest dresses, breezy matching sets, and Cowboy Cartner-ready extras.¬†¬†Click through for 39 of the best summer-ready finds from Nordstrom‚Äôs sale section ‚Äî all editor-approved and all worth scooping up before they‚Äôre gone.All linked products are independently selected by our editors. title: The Ultimate Guide To 2025‚Äôs Hottest Summer Fashion Trends
description: It can be easy to fall into a fashion rut in the spring when April (and May) Showers make it wet and dreary outside ‚Äî practical rain gear typically takes precedence over chic looks, after all. But that‚Äôs not the case once summer rears its head. Sure, we‚Äôll still have the occasional thunderstorm, but the sunny, warm forecast makes outfit planning much more enjoyable. As such, it‚Äôs time to recharge your fashion batteries and feel inspired again. Luckily, the runways provided no shortage of summer 2025 trends to try over the next three months ‚Äî and beyond.¬† And if you can‚Äôt resist partaking in a viral internet trend, you‚Äôll have several aesthetics to pick from this season too. For instance, the fisherman look ‚Äî striped shirts, boat shoes, and bucket hats √† la Nancy Meyers ‚Äî reigned at shows like Sacai and Miu Miu. Now, the nautical style is gaining momentum off the runway, with indie brands such as Everlane and STAUD releasing beachy ready-to-wear and accessories. Meanwhile, the boho revival is maintaining its grip on the masses this summer, thanks in part to Chlo√©‚Äôs creative director, Chemena Kamali, who has championed the look since taking the helm in 2023. The gauzy sheer dresses from the fashion house‚Äôs latest collection are sure to come out to play this season. From sequins to gingham, green and athletic-leaning styles, there are plenty of new trends that will be hard to unsee (and shop for) once you notice them.¬† Scroll below for a rundown of the summer trends ruling the style scene, as well as corresponding pieces to add to your warm weather rotation.¬† Summer 2025 Trend: Shine Bright Sequins are no longer reserved for festive holiday parties or lavish nights out. This season, designers encourage you to incorporate sparkly looks into your everyday wardrobe. Prada, for instance, styled a shimmering silver gown underneath a bright yellow raincoat ‚Äî because why not look fabulous in a storm? Sandy Liang, on the other hand, debuted a mini dress with a silver sequin top and lace sleeves, offering up something unexpected to wear to your next Saturday brunch. It may seem extravagant to dazzle in the daylight, but as shown by these heavy-hitters, there‚Äôs no reason you can‚Äôt.¬† Summer 2025 Trend: Boho Babe Sienna Miller, Kate Moss‚Ä¶you know where we‚Äôre going with this. These two early aughts fashion icons embody the modern-day blueprint for the free-spirited look. In 2025, the eclectic aesthetic has been reimagined through a luxury lens. On the aforementioned Chlo√© runway, romantic lace frocks, billowy separates, and long pendant necklaces arrived in droves. Over at Isabel Marant, Glastonbury-ready fringe dresses, tops, and mini skirts effortlessly swished back and forth down the catwalk. You needn‚Äôt be at a musical festival to dabble in the trend, though; a sultry see-through or dreamy layered look are essentials for an evening out. Summer 2025 Trend: Spot On Designers have spoken: Polka dots are summer‚Äôs It print. Toeing the line between timeless and trendy, the pattern was out in full force on the runways. At Carolina Herrera, looks were splashed with the pattern in classic black-and-white, appearing in the form of matching sets, crochet dresses, pumps, and more. (Side note: Did you catch Meghann Fahy wearing one of the label‚Äôs older polka dot gowns in Netflix‚Äôs new hit series Sirens?) Acne Studios made the case for marrying a form-fitting spotted tee with wide-leg denim jeans or shorts. In the wise words of Hannah Montana: ‚ÄúPop it, lock it, polka dot it.‚Äù Summer 2025 Trend: Fisherman Core Nautical, fisherman, coastal chic ‚Äî whatever you like to call the aesthetic, there‚Äôs no denying it‚Äôs at the forefront of fashion this summer. The sea-inspired trend began brewing on the spring 2024 catwalks, primarily at Miu Miu (hello, boat shoes), and has now migrated to our social media feeds. In fact, we have a sneaking suspicion that not a day goes by without scrolling past a fashion person showing off their fisherman sandals or seashell jewelry. For a runway styling approach, take cues from Sacai and wear your Breton stripes alongside tailored white trousers. Summer 2025 Trend: Sporty Spice The industry‚Äôs love for athleisure is unwavering. Case in point: Technical yet elevated outerwear popped up at Miu Miu (by way of blouson jackets) and Rabanne (windbreakers). The shows also ushered in a new crop of luxe sweatpants, such as the roomy drawstring pairs at Tory Burch, which were rolled up and layered atop equally cute one-piece swimsuits. Any way you slice it, chic activewear is coming for your summer wardrobe.¬† Summer 2025 Trend: Green With Envy Brat summer may be in the rearview mirror, but designers are keeping the green trend alive and well this year. And not just the Nickelodeon slime-esque hue Charli XCX became synonymous with ‚Äî other shades, such as emerald, pistachio, and olive, got the runway stamp of approval, seen at the likes of Victoria Beckham, Valentino, and Gucci, among many more. Sorry, butter yellow, you have some competition. Summer 2025 Trend: Mad For Plaid You probably reach for your plaid looks ad nauseam during the fall. This year, however, designers want you to pull the classic pieces out a bit earlier. Acne Studios went all in on the pattern, styling a button-down shirt with a bubble skirt in a contrasting plaid print. Kallmeyer debuted a flirty checkered tank top alongside understated black trousers. Consider this the perfect between-seasons trend to tap into when early September rolls around. Like what you see? How about some more R29 goodness, right here?Milkmaid Dresses Are Trending: 25 Summer StylesMiami Swim Week Trends: Swim Skirts To Crochet7 European Summer Staples For Vacation Outfits
author: Kelsey Stewart

title: 4 Editors Try Reformation's Swimwear - Here's What We Think
description: It may come as no surprise that Reformation's swimwear comes with new and improved materials. The line, which retails from $68 to $168 in sizes XS-XL, is made from a renewable and bio-based fiber called EVO by Fulgar. And, according to Reformation's chief innovation officer Alison Melville, the product will only grow more sustainable with each seasonal drop (check out their most recent drop here!). The first range incorporated deadstock fabric from the brand's debut swimwear collection in 2019, and Reformation promises to "continue innovating and trying out new materials until we create the most sustainable swimwear possible," according to Melville. Instantly attracted to the striking bikinis and one-pieces, PS editors were eager to get our hands on the swimwear designs, many of which were influenced by bestselling products across other categories. "We designed Ref Swim to complement and round out our customers' existing Ref wardrobes," Melville tells PS. "Throughout the design process, we were inspired by the concept of outfitting and looked to the silhouettes of some of our top performing apparel items to create complementary swim pieces." For example, the Bryson Dress is one of their most popular styles in 2025 so they carried the vibrant red color and the sweetheart neckline detail through in the Soleil Bikini Top. Melville confirms that the success of the drops has exceeded expectations, with solid colors being most popular - a trend that speaks to the Ref shopper's love for '90s minimalism. The Tossa Top (now out of stock), Azure Bottom, and Soleil Top were within the top five SKUs at the original time of publishing this story, and they just so happen to be three of the pieces we selected to try at PS. Ahead, you'll hear from four different editors about their experiences trying Reformation swimwear with one shared sentiment: the quality is in the fabric and the fit. Plus, we've added a couple more styles for you to shop from. Update on June 18, 2025 at 2:00 PM ET: Updated prices and checked stock for all products. @ps.feelgood Reformation's revamped swimwear might be giving the brand's dresses a run for their money, and we're here for it! The swimwear comes with new and improved sustainable materials. These four editors give a more in-depth review at our üîó in bio. #Reformation #Swimwear #Summer ‚ô¨ original sound - Popsugar
author: Sarah Wasilak

title: 19 Early Prime Day Fashion Deals, Including Kendall Jenner's $9 Tank
description: Fashion connoisseurs, rejoice. Amazon Prime Day might be two weeks away, but the deals have already started. Ahead of the sale's July 8 live date, shoppers can take advantage of some of the year's biggest deals - including markdowns on bestselling styles like handbags, leggings, everyday sneakers, and more. As shopping experts, we're essentially always tuned into Amazon's best deals and markdowns - from savings on cult-favorite beauty products to price drops on Amazon's most coveted home essentials and discounts on top-rated wellness products. And of course, we curated a guide to the best Prime Day fashion to help you better sort through these deals. FYI: these fashion deals are going fast, so you'll want to keep your credit card handy and act quickly. Our Favorite Early Amazon Prime Day Fashion Deals to Shop Kendall Jenner's favorite tank top: Hanes Ecosmart Cotton Tank at $9, originally $11 The pajama sets of all pajama sets: Eberjey Gisele Rib Relaxed Short PJ Set at $104, originally $148 A versatile summer dress: Amazon The Drop Kimi Ruffled-Shoulder Smocked Midi Dress at $35, originally $70 The affordable leggings to motivate you to work out: Satina High Waisted Leggings at $15, originally $18 Keep scrolling to shop our top Prime Day sale picks, and be sure to sign up for Amazon Prime so that you don't miss a moment of the action. Looking for more deals? Check out PS's editor-curated Prime Day sale picks and subscribe to our newsletter for more shopping recommendations. title: 8 Best and Built to Last: the Most Durable Watches in 2025
description: Forgive me, Father, for I have sinned. I fear I‚Äôve broken one too many watches. There was my digital design that suffered a fatal blow during an epic upper-body session. And there was my classic chronograph that took one too many knocks at university. And how can I forget the Casio that I dropped under ‚Ä¶ Continue reading 8 Best and Built to Last: the Most Durable Watches in 2025 ‚Üí
